projects.title: DoD Platform One PartyBus
projects.description: Foundation engineer and top contributor for DoD's largest secure platform-as-a-service used across mission systems.
highlights: Built secure-by-default platform patterns reused across classification levels.
Reduced deployment timelines from years to weeks with automated delivery.
Implemented strong service-to-service controls and certificate rotation.
Enabled mission operations through resilient and scalable platform engineering.

projects.title: CMS Healthcare Modernization

highlights: Accelerated release cadence from months to weekly deployments.

Maintained compliance with FISMA, NIST, and FedRAMP controls.
Improved reliability and operational visibility for health systems.

projects.title: Operation Allies Refuge

highlights: Enabled real-time coordination across military and allied teams.
